faq.question: What are the best spelling words for 1st graders?
faq.answer: The best words include sight words (the, and, you), CVC words (cat, dog, sun), and easy blends (ship, frog).

faq.question: How can I help my child memorize spelling words?
faq.answer: Use fun techniques like spelling games, writing words in sand, and singing spelling songs.

faq.question: How many spelling words should a 1st grader learn per week?
faq.answer: A good range is 10-15 words per week to keep learning fun and manageable.
